---
repo-actions: false
listing:
  id: listing-extensions
  contents:
    - extensions/yaml/**.yml
  type: grid
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  categories: true
  page-size: 10
  grid-columns: 2
  grid-item-align: center
  sort:
    - title
include-in-header:
  text: |
    <style>
    .category {
      text-transform: uppercase;
    }
    .quarto-grid-item .card-title {
      font-size: 1.5em;
      font-weight: 600;
      margin-bottom: 0.5em;
    }
    .quarto-grid-item .card-other-values tr>td:first-of-type {
      font-weight: 600;
      padding-right: 1em;
      padding-left: 1em;
      vertical-align: top;
      text-transform: capitalize;
    }
    </style>
---

::: {#listing-extensions}
:::
